IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: NO-COST EMOTIONAL SUPPORT AND EDUCATION FOR PEOPLE AFFECTED BY CANCER.
IRS990.MissionDesc: OUR MISSION IS TO ENSURE THAT ALL PEOPLE IMPACTED BY CANCER ARE EMPOWERED BY KNOWLEDGE, STRENGTHENED BY ACTION, AND SUSTAINED BY COMMUNITY. PROGRAMS OFFERED ARE TOTALLY FREE FOR INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES IMPACTED BY CANCER.
IRS990.Desc: PROGRAM SERVICE INCLUDES HEALTHY LIFESTYLE, SUPPORT, EDUCATION, AND SOCIAL PROGRAMS FOR CHILDREN, TEENS AND ADULTS WITH ANY CANCER AT ANY STAGE OF THE DISEASE. THESE PROGRAMS WERE HELD IN-PERSON THEN SUBSEQUENTLY ONLINE VIA VARIOUS VIRTUAL PLATFORMS BECAUSE OF THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC. HEALTHY LIFESTYLE PROGRAMS INCLUDE EXERCISE CLASSES, NUTRITION AND COOKING CLASSES, AS WELL AS MIND AND BODY PROGRAMS TO IMPROVE PHYSICAL WELL-BEING. EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS ARE INFORMATIVE FOR ANYONE IMPACTED BY CANCER AND INCLUDE TOPICS RANGING FROM HOW TO APPLY FOR SSI TO NEW TREATMENT OPTIONS. SOCIAL PROGRAMS INCLUDE CRAFTS, MOVIES, AND HOLIDAY PARTIES WHICH ENCOURAGE INTERACTION BETWEEN PARTICIPANTS. SUPPORT PROGRAMS INCLUDE A VARIETY OF SUPPORT AND NETWORKING GROUPS HELD TO INCREASE CONNECTIONS BETWEEN PEOPLE DEALING WITH SIMILAR STRUGGLES. OUTPUTS FOR THESE PROGRAMS ARE NOT NECESSARILY TANGIBLE, BECAUSE THESE ARE VOLUNTARY PROGRAMS. IN 2020, THERE WERE 467 HEALTHY LIFESTYLE PROGRAMS, 403 SUPPORT PROGRAMS, 75 EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND 163 SOCIAL PROGRAMS.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: JONATHAN MARKS CPA CFF CITP CGMA

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT CONSIST OF FUNDS DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD FOR NUTRITIONAL PROGRAMS AND FUNDS PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED SUBJECT TO AN ENDOWMENT SPENDING POLICY AND APPROPPRIATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XI, LINE 4B
SCHEDULE D, PAGE 4, PART XII, LINE 2D

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PART V LINE 1A COLUMN B ENDOWMENT FUNDS-BEGINNING OF YEAR BALANCE, PRIOR YEAR THE STEPHEN FRISHBERG FUND WAS CREATED IN 2009, BY STEPHEN FRISHBERG, A FORMER DIRECTOR OF THE ORGANIZATION, WITH THE OBJECTIVE THE FUND REACHES 100,000 IN VALUE. THE INVESTMENT INCOME WAS TO CONTINUE TO ACCUMULATE OR BE DISTRIBUTED AT THE DIRECTION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FOR PROGRAM USE ONLY, BUT THE PRINCIPAL OF THE ENDOWMENT GIFTS MADE MUST REMAIN INTACT UNTIL 2020. THE PRINCIPAL OF THE ENDOWMENT GIFTS WAS 58,748 AS OF JANUARY 1, 2019. THE BALANCE OF THE FUND AS OF JANUARY 1, 2019, WAS 89,927. THESE FUNDS WERE CONSIDERED NET ASSETS WITH DONOR RESTRICTIONS BUT WERE RECLASSED AS AN ENDOWMENT TO MORE ACCURATELY REFLECT THE INTENT OF THE DONOR. DURING 2019, THE FUND EARNED 4,921 AND RELEASED 36,100, LEAVING THE PRINCIPAL BALANCE OF 58,748 INTACT. CONSISTENT WITH THE FUND'S STIPULATIONS, THE BOARD WAS PERMITTED TO USE THE PRINCIPAL FOR A SPECIFIC PROJECT, BUT NOT GENERAL OPERATIONS, OR IT COULD BE MAINTAINED AS AN ENDOWMENT FOR FUTURE, USE, IF THE BALANCE IN THE FUND WAS LESS THAN 100,000 ON DECEMBER 31, 2020. THE VALUE OF THE FUND ON DECEMBER 31, 2020, WAS 66,103. BY RESOLUTION OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ON FEBRUARY 28, 2021, THE BOARD APPROVED THE USE OF THE PRINCIPAL FROM THE FRISHBERG FUNDS SPECIFICALLY FOR CAPITAL IMPROVEMENT AND HAS RECLASSIFIED THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 58,748 TO NET ASSETS WITHOUT DONOR RESTRICTIONS - BOARD DESIGNATED.

PROGRAM SERVICE INCLUDES HEALTHY LIFESTYLE, SUPPORT, EDUCATION, AND SOCIAL PROGRAMS FOR CHILDREN, TEENS AND ADULTS WITH ANY CANCER AT ANY STAGE OF THE DISEASE. THESE PROGRAMS WERE HELD IN-PERSON THEN SUBSEQUENTLY ONLINE VIA VARIOUS VIRTUAL PLATFORMS BECAUSE OF THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC. HEALTHY LIFESTYLE PROGRAMS INCLUDE EXERCISE CLASSES, NUTRITION AND COOKING CLASSES, AS WELL AS MIND AND BODY PROGRAMS TO IMPROVE PHYSICAL WELL-BEING. EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS ARE INFORMATIVE FOR ANYONE IMPACTED BY CANCER AND INCLUDE TOPICS RANGING FROM HOW TO APPLY FOR SSI TO NEW TREATMENT OPTIONS. SOCIAL PROGRAMS INCLUDE CRAFTS, MOVIES, AND HOLIDAY PARTIES WHICH ENCOURAGE INTERACTION BETWEEN PARTICIPANTS. SUPPORT PROGRAMS INCLUDE A VARIETY OF SUPPORT AND NETWORKING GROUPS HELD TO INCREASE CONNECTIONS BETWEEN PEOPLE DEALING WITH SIMILAR STRUGGLES. OUTPUTS FOR THESE PROGRAMS ARE NOT NECESSARILY TANGIBLE, BECAUSE THESE ARE VOLUNTARY PROGRAMS. IN 2020, THERE WERE 467 HEALTHY LIFESTYLE PROGRAMS, 403 SUPPORT PROGRAMS, 75 EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND 163 SOCIAL PROGRAMS.
THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY MANAGEMENT AND THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND THEN MADE AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING.

THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AT A BOARD MEETING. THE ORGANIZATION DISTRIBUTES CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS TO EACH BOARD MEMBER ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, WHICH ARE SIGNED AND MAINTAINED BY THE ORGANIZATION.

THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE PERFORMS A FORMAL REVIEW OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, REVIEWS SALARY DATA BASED ON SIMILAR POSITIONS, AND DOCUMENTS THE FINAL SALARY DETERMINATION CONTEMPORANEOUSLY.
DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
